pkgmetadata.longdescription: Big Lasso: Extending Lasso Model Fitting to Big Data in R // Extend lasso and elastic-net model fitting for ultrahigh- dimensional, multi-gigabyte data sets that cannot be loaded into memory. Compared to existing lasso-fitting packages, it preserves equivalently fast computation speed but is much more memory-efficient, thus allowing for very powerful big data analysis even with only a single laptop.
